reference.description: bz#1896536: CVE-2015-8011 lldpd: buffer overflow in the lldp_decode function in daemon/protocols/lldp.c

remediation.description:
Before applying this update, make sure all previously released errata relevant to your system have been applied.
For details on how to apply this update, refer to:
https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258

note:
An update for openvswitch2.13 is now available in Fast Datapath for Red Hat
Enterprise Linux 8.

Open vSwitch provides standard network bridging functions and support for
the OpenFlow protocol for remote per-flow control of traffic.
Bug Fix(es) and Enhancement(s):
* Bad description of the MPLS BOS field in ovs-fields(7) (BZ#1842032)
* Missing conflicts for older openvswitch packages (BZ#1886836)
* [20.I RHEL-8] Fast Datapath Release (BZ#1894090)
